argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | crng2idl.i | |- I = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( I i^i I ) = I |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_crngridl | |- ( R e. CRing -> I = ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ineq2d | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( I i^i I ) = ( I i^i ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_syl5eqr | |- ( R e. CRing -> I = ( I i^i ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) = ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 2Ideal ` R ) = ( 2Ideal ` R ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 7, 8 | #P_2idlval | |- ( 2Ideal ` R ) = ( I i^i ( LIdeal ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( R e. CRing -> I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) ) |
